PERSONA:
meet kwame, a 35-year-old married man residing in a metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. born in another country, he immigrated to the u.s. within the last decade and is a black non-hispanic individual.

kwame is a highly educated professional, having obtained a postgraduate degree. he is a devout protestant and a born-again or evangelical christian, attending religious services once or twice a month. his strong faith aligns with his liberal political ideology, and he is a staunch supporter of the democratic party.

despite his busy schedule, kwame tries to stay connected by using the internet almost constantly. he comes from an affluent background, with a family income exceeding $100,000, placing him in the upper-income tier. however, he does not currently engage in any volunteer work.

kwame is a well-rounded individual who values education, religion, and progressive ideals. he is an active participant in his community and stays informed on current events and issues. with his diverse background and experiences, he brings a unique perspective to his social and professional circles.
